thread.title: U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton says Arctic drilling 'not worth the risk'
thread.title_full: U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton says Arctic drilling 'not worth the risk'

title: U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton says Arctic drilling 'not worth the risk'
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Aug 18, 2015, 15:14 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 16 mins U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton says Arctic drilling 'not worth the risk' Reuters - UK Focus – 12 minutes ago 25.93 -0.46 
Aug 18 (Reuters) - U.S (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) . Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said in a Twitter (Xetra: A1W6XZ - news ) post on Tuesday that drilling for oil and gas in the Arctic Ocean was "not worth the risk." 
"The Arctic is a unique treasure," Clinton said. 
The Obama administration on Monday gave Royal Dutch Shell (Xetra: R6C1.DE - news ) final approval to resume drilling in the environmentally fragile ocean for the first time since 2012. (Reporting by Emily Stephenson and Amanda Becker; Editing by Lisa Lambert) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
